title: My Store

embed.description: That's it! Your Shop is now open, so go eat a four-leaf clover, find a rainbow, and throw a horseshoe at someone (we don't actually know how luck works).

body: I just bought a $25 dollar RP gift card, and I'm curious as to when "my store" will be available again.  Like, the one with the discounted skins for the champs that I play.

replies.body:
I'm not sure! I'm certain there will be an official announcement on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) when it does, so I recommend keeping an eye on that page!

Let me know if you have any questions.
